Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: High cylindrical vase with pointed rim, straight walls and flat base. Pink-coloured paste and surfaces covered with a coating of the same colour. It has a painted decoration which covers the whole exterior surface of the piece. The decoration is divided into three horizontal bands, with joined ankh signs between them, in black and red. On the base is a rosette of twenty petals, delimited by a circle in black which is set off by a groove.
